# Multi-Task Reinforcement Learning - Dependencies
# Project: VarShare Experiment on Lunar Lander Variants

# RL Environment Library (replaces old 'gym')
# [box2d] includes PyBox2D physics engine and pygame for rendering
gymnasium[box2d]>=0.29.0

# Deep Learning Framework (already installed, but listed for completeness)
torch>=2.0.0

# Numerical Computing (already installed, but listed for completeness)
numpy>=1.24.0

# Visualization (already installed, but listed for completeness)
matplotlib>=3.8.0

# Progress bars for training loops
tqdm>=4.65.0

# Optional: Enhanced logging and experiment tracking
# tensorboard>=2.15.0  # Uncomment if you want TensorBoard logging
